Poetry

  • Ozymandias – Percy Bysshe Shelley (1818)

  • Tears, Idle Tears – Alfred, Lord Tennyson (1847)
  • The Eagle – Alfred, Lord Tennyson (1851)
  • When Lilacs Last in the Dooryard Bloom’d – Walt Whitman (1865)
  • The Windhover – Gerard Manley Hopkins (1877/1918)
  • "I loved you first: but afterwards your love" – Christina Rossetti (1881)
  • Carrion Comfort – Gerard Manley Hopkins (1885/1918)
  • Because I could not stop for Death – – Emily Dickinson (1890)
  • The Love Song of J. Alfred Prufrock – T.S. Eliot (1915)
  • No Second Troy – William Butler Yeats (1916)
  • The Road Not Taken – Robert Frost (1916)
  • The Second Coming – William Butler Yeats (1920)
  • Stopping by Woods on a Snowy Evening – Robert Frost (1923)
  • This Is Just To Say – William Carlos Williams (1934)
  • Do not go gentle into that good night – Dylan Thomas (1951)
  • Missed Time – Ha Jin (2000)
  • Ramallah – Bei Dao (2006)
  • Triage of Two Cultures – Kaveh Danesh (2019)
  • To Make a Living – Michelle Tong (2020)

Song
